#Radio - элемент формы

##Files

* [radio.css](../../public/css/radio.css)

##Template for PHPStorm

```
<div class="dhrtRadio">
    <label>
        <input type="radio" class="dhrtRadio-noView" value="$value$">
        <span class="dhrtRadioView"></span>
        <span>$value$</span>
    </label>
</div>

```
